LanguageData.RT_Wirbelwind_Vehicle.label: Wirbelwind
LanguageData.RT_Wirbelwind_Vehicle.description:
A SPAAG based on the famous Pz.IV platform, with four 20x102mm cannons, could strike deadly bullet to air enemy or ground target.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x3, MG Gunner x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
20x102mm(Main cannon)
7.62x54mmR (Hull and Coaxial MG)
